channel.title: How do I make it actually shoot arrows, and shoot from distance
channel.description:
Well I am trying to make range pking decent again on my server, and cant figure out how to make it shoot form 10 spaces away or whatever, also, how do I make it shoot arrows, like you MUST have arrows to shoot...
Basically I want you to equip arrows, take bow, and shoot from distance....
HOW?!??!

item.title: How do I make it actually shoot arrows, and shoot from distance
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

HahBahGee:

Well I am trying to make range pking decent again on my server,

Increase the dbow spec lol. Thats what I did.

Read full topic
